overview:
Julian Khoo has more than 10 years of experience in the IT industry, specifically in enterprise software development.

Having led the development of various products such as the award winning tmsEKP, which is an Enterprise Knowledge Portal that won the best General Application award in APICTA (Asia Pacific ICT Award) in 2004, he also has vast experience in large scale project implementations and contributed to the success of high profile projects for key customers such as AirAsia.

He graduated with BSc Computing Science (1st Class Honours with Best Student Award) from the University of Manchester Institute of Science and Technology (UMIST), United Kingdom in 1999.

His technical expertise comprises a wide range of areas which includes different programming languages, frameworks, architectures, and software development practices across a multitude of IT environments.

degrees.subject: Computing Science
degrees.institution: University of Manchester Institute of Science and Technology
